channel.title: Google-My-Business on 360º Virtual Tours in Gambia

item.title: My Business Provider!
item.description: Through collaboration with our Google Street View Trusted Photographer Eduard de Boer, we are now also a My Business Provider, not only for The Gambia, but also for Africa and the rest of the World!
